channel.title: CVE Feed for VIMESA -- VHF/FM Transmitter Blue Plus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VIMESA -- VHF/FM Transmitter Blue Plus

item.title: CVE-2024-9692|2024-10-24T16:20:57.274Z -- vimesa -- vhf%2Ffm%20transmitter%20blue%20plus
item.description: VIMESA VHF/FM Transmitter Blue Plus is suffering from a Denial-of-Service (DoS) vulnerability. An unauthenticated attacker can issue an unauthorized HTTP GET request to the unprotected endpoint 'doreboot' and restart the transmitter operations.
